VEC.Q: How many labels are in this radar chart?

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Skill Proficiency Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Skill Proficiency Rate is Retention Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Promotion Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Skill Proficiency Rate is Pay Equity Ratio.

SRP.Q: On the Promotion Rate, is the point for Walker-Haynes inside or outside the point for Knox LLC?
SRP.A: On the Promotion Rate, the point for Walker-Haynes is inside the point for Knox LLC.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Offer Acceptance Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Walker-Haynes?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Offer Acceptance Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Skill Proficiency Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Skill Proficiency Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Skill Proficiency Rate, label {Walker-Haynes} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Retention Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Retention Rate, label {Walker-Haynes} scores the lowest.

VE.Q: What is the value of Walker-Haynes on the Pay Equity Ratio in the radar chart?

EVJ.A: The maximum value of Knox LLC across all dimensions is {95}.

EVJ.A: The minimum value of Walker-Haynes across all dimensions is {95}.

NF.Q: Which labels have scores below 29 for the Pay Equity Ratio dimension? Please list the labels and corresponding scores.

NC.Q: For Walker-Haynes, which dimension has a higher score: Retention Rate or Promotion Rate?
NC.A: {Promotion Rate} has a higher score than Retention Rate for Walker-Haynes.

NC.Q: On Promotion Rate, which label has a higher score: Walker-Haynes or the Knox LLC?

NC.Q: On Job Satisfaction, which label has a higher score: Knox LLC or the Walker-Haynes?
NC.A: {Knox LLC} has a higher score on Job Satisfaction compared to Walker-Haynes.

NC.Q: For Walker-Haynes, which dimension has a higher score: Time-to-Fill Rate or Pay Equity Ratio or Retention Rate?
NC.A: {Retention Rate} has a higher score for Walker-Haynes.

MSR.Q: For Knox LLC, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Knox LLC most needs to improve its {Pay Equity Ratio}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {Knox LLC}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the weaknest overall capability is {Walker-Haynes}.
